titles.title: Janey Ensminger Act of 2019
Janey Ensminger Act of 2019

A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to the Agency for Toxic Substances and Disease Registry's review and publication of illness and conditions relating to veterans stationed at Camp Lejeune, North Carolina, and their family members, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Janey Ensminger Act of 2019
This bill addresses the determination of, and subsequent care for, illnesses or conditions in veterans and their family members for which there is evidence that the cause may have been related to exposure to a toxic substance during a specified time frame at Camp Lejeune, North Carolina.
